ValheimPlus.description_website: Specifically about the internal settings of Valheim Plus.

enabled.description: Change true to false to disable this section

mainMenuLogo.description: Display the Valheim Plus logo in the main menu

AdvancedBuildingMode.description_website: A advanced building mode with several features to improve quality of life in building mode using a precise hotkey system.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section, if you set this to false the mode will not be accesible

enterAdvancedBuildingMode.description: Enter the advanced building mode with this key when building

exitAdvancedBuildingMode.description: Exit the advanced building mode with this key when building

copyObjectRotation.description: Copy the object rotation of the currently selected object in ABM

pasteObjectRotation.description: Apply the copied object rotation to the currently selected object in ABM

increaseScrollSpeed.description: Increases the amount an object rotates and moves. Holding Shift will increase in increments of 10 instead of 1.

decreaseScrollSpeed.description: Decreases the amount an object rotates and moves. Holding Shift will decrease in increments of 10 instead of 1.

AdvancedEditingMode.description_website: A advanced editing mode with several features to improve quality of life when moving objects using a precise hotkey system.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section, if you set this to false the mode will not be accesible

enterAdvancedEditingMode.description: Enter the advanced building mode with this key when building

resetAdvancedEditingMode.description: Reset the object to its original position and rotation

abortAndExitAdvancedEditingMode.description: Exit the advanced editing mode with this key and reset the object

confirmPlacementOfAdvancedEditingMode.description: Confirm the placement of the object and place it

copyObjectRotation.description: Copy the object rotation of the currently selected object in AEM

pasteObjectRotation.description: Apply the copied object rotation to the currently selected object in AEM

increaseScrollSpeed.description: Increases the amount an object rotates and moves. Holding Shift will increase in increments of 10 instead of 1.

decreaseScrollSpeed.description: Decreases the amount an object rotates and moves. Holding Shift will decrease in increments of 10 instead of 1.

Beehive.description_website: Change the in-game beheavior of the beehive and modify its values.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

honeyProductionSpeed.description: configure the speed at which the bees produce honey in seconds, 1200 seconds are 24 ingame hours

maximumHoneyPerBeehive.description: configure the maximum amount of honey in beehives

autoDeposit.description: Instead of dropping the items, they will be placed inside nearby chests instead.

autoDepositRange.description: The range of the chest detection for the auto deposit feature. (Maximum is 50)

showDuration.description: Display the minutes and seconds until the beehive produces honey on hover

Building.description_website: Change the beheavior of the in-game building objects and their placement restrictions.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

noInvalidPlacementRestriction.description: Remove some of the Invalid placement messages, most notably provides the ability to place objects into other objects

noMysticalForcesPreventPlacementRestrict.description: Removes the 'Mystical forces' building prevention and allows destruction of build objects in those areas with the hammer.

noWeatherDamage.description: Removes the weather damage from rain

maximumPlacementDistance.description: The maximum range that you can place build objects at

pieceComfortRadius.description: The radius, in meters, in which a piece must be to contribute to the comfort level.

alwaysDropResources.description: When destroying a building piece, setting this to true will ensure it always drops full resources.

alwaysDropExcludedResources.description: When destroying a building piece, setting this to true will ensure it always drops pieces that the devs have marked as do not drop

enableAreaRepair.description: Setting this to true will cause repairing with the hammer to repair in a radius.

areaRepairRadius.description: Sets the area repair radius. A value of 7.5 would mean your repair radius is 7.5m. Requires enableAreaRepair=true

CraftFromChest.description_website: Allows crafting using content of nearby chests.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

checkFromWorkbench.description: If in a workbench area, uses it as reference point when scanning for chests

range.description: The range of the chest detection (Maximum is 50)

lookupInterval.description: Interval in seconds between each nearby chests discovery (Maximum is 50)

Camera.description_website: Change the beheavior of the in-game camera.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

cameraMaximumZoomDistance.description: The maximum zoom distance to your character

cameraBoatMaximumZoomDistance.description: The maximum zoom distance to your character when in a boat

Experience.description_website: Modify the experience gained for actions in the game.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

swords.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of swords.

knives.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of knives.

clubs.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of clubs.

polearms.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of polearms.

spears.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of spears.

blocking.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of blocking.

axes.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of axes.

bows.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of bows.

fireMagic.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of fire magic.

frostMagic.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of frost magic.

unarmed.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of unarmed.

pickaxes.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of mining.

woodCutting.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of wood cutting.

jump.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of jumping.

sneak.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of sneaking.

run.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of running.

swim.description: The modifier value for the experience gained of swimming.

Fermenter.description_website: Change the in-game beheavior of the fermenter and modify its values.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

fermenterDuration.description: configure the time that the fermenter takes to produce its product, 2400 seconds are 48 ingame hours

fermenterItemsProduced.description: configure the total amount of produced items from a fermenter.

showDuration.description: Display the minutes and seconds until the fermenter is done on hover

FireSource.description_website: Change the in-game beheavior of torches and fireplaces.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

torches.description: If set to true, torch-type fire sources will stay at max fuel level once filled

fires.description: If set to true, non torch-type fire sources will stay at max fuel level once filled

autoFuel.description: Look for fuel inside nearby chests

ignorePrivateAreaCheck.description: Change true to false to enable private area check when looking for chests.

autoRange.description: The range of the chest detection for the auto fuel feature.

Food.description_website: Change the in-game beheavior of food and its values.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

foodDurationMultiplier.description: Increase or reduce the time that food lasts by %. The value 50 would cause food to run out 50% slower.

disableFoodDegradation.description: If set to true, this option prevents food degrading over time - in other words, it retains its maximum benefit until it expires.

Smelter.description_website: Change the in-game beheavior of the smelter and modify its values.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

maximumOre.description: Maximum amount of ore in a smelter

maximumCoal.description: Maximum amount of coal in a smelter

coalUsedPerProduct.description: The total amount of coal used to produce a single smelted ingot.

productionSpeed.description: The time it takes for the smelter to produce a single ingot in seconds.

autoDeposit.description: Instead of dropping the items, they will be placed inside nearby chests instead.

autoFuel.description: Look for fuel inside nearby chests

ignorePrivateAreaCheck.description: Change true to false to enable private area check when looking for chests.

autoRange.description: The range of the chest detection for the auto deposit and fuel features. (Maximum is 50)

Furnace.description_website: Change the in-game beheavior of the furnace and modify its values.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

maximumOre.description: Maximum amount of ore in a furnace

maximumCoal.description: Maximum amount of coal in a furnace

coalUsedPerProduct.description: The total amount of coal used to produce a single smelted ingot.

productionSpeed.description: The time it takes for the smelter to produce a single ingot in seconds.

autoDeposit.description: Instead of dropping the items, they will be placed inside nearby chests instead.

autoFuel.description: Look for fuel inside nearby chests

ignorePrivateAreaCheck.description: Change true to false to enable private area check when looking for chests.

autoRange.description: The range of the chest detection for the auto deposit and fuel features. (Maximum is 50)

Game.description_website: Change the general games behavior and its values, including difficulty and portals.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

gameDifficultyDamageScale.description: The games damage multiplier per person nearby in difficultyScaleRange(m) radius.

gameDifficultyHealthScale.description: The games health multiplier per person nearby in difficultyScaleRange(m) radius.

extraPlayerCountNearby.description: Adds additional players to the difficulty calculation in multiplayer unrelated to the actual amount

setFixedPlayerCountTo.description: Sets the nearby player count always to this value + extraPlayerCountNearby.

difficultyScaleRange.description: Instead of dropping the items, they will be placed inside nearby chests instead.

disablePortals.description: If you set this to true, all portals will be disabled

KeyCodes.description_website: Adds custom hotkeys to the game for in-game actions.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

Items.description_website: Change the in-game beheavior of items and modify their values.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

noTeleportPrevention.description: Enables you to teleport with ores and other usually restricted objects

baseItemWeightReduction.description: Increase or reduce item weight by % percent. The value -50 will reduce item weight of every object by 50%.

itemStackMultiplier.description: Increase the size of all item stacks by %. The value 50 would set a usual item stack of 100 to be 150.

droppedItemOnGroundDurationInSeconds.description: Set duration that dropped items live before despawning. Game default is 3600 seconds.

HUD.description_website: Change the in-game player interface and its behavior.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

showRequiredItems.description: Shows the required amount of items AND the amount of items in your inventory in build mode and while crafting.

experienceGainedNotifications.description: Shows small notifications about all skill experienced gained in the top left corner.

displayStaminaValue.description: Shows current and max stamina numerically underneath the stamina bar.

removeDamageFlash.description: Set to true to remove the red screen flash overlay when the player takes damage.

Gathering.description_website: Change gathering rates of resources in the world.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

dropChance.description: Modify the chance to drop resources from resource nodes affected by this category

wood.description: The value 50 will increase the dropped resources from 10 to 15. The value -50 will reduce the amount of dropped resources from 10 to 5.

stone.description: The value 50 will increase the dropped resources from 10 to 15. The value -50 will reduce the amount of dropped resources from 10 to 5.

fineWood.description: The value 50 will increase the dropped resources from 10 to 15. The value -50 will reduce the amount of dropped resources from 10 to 5..

coreWood.description: The value 50 will increase the dropped resources from 10 to 15. The value -50 will reduce the amount of dropped resources from 10 to 5.

elderBark.description: The value 50 will increase the dropped resources from 10 to 15. The value -50 will reduce the amount of dropped resources from 10 to 5.

ironScrap.description: The value 50 will increase the dropped resources from 10 to 15. The value -50 will reduce the amount of dropped resources from 10 to 5.

tinOre.description: The value 50 will increase the dropped resources from 10 to 15. The value -50 will reduce the amount of dropped resources from 10 to 5.

copperOre.description: The value 50 will increase the dropped resources from 10 to 15. The value -50 will reduce the amount of dropped resources from 10 to 5.

silverOre.description: The value 50 will increase the dropped resources from 10 to 15. The value -50 will reduce the amount of dropped resources from 10 to 5.

Chitin.description: The value 50 will increase the dropped resources from 10 to 15. The value -50 will reduce the amount of dropped resources from 10 to 5.

Durability.description_website: Change the in-game durability values of certain item types.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

axes.description: The value 50 will increase the durability from 100 to 150. The value -50 will reduce the durability from 100 to 50.

pickaxes.description: The value 50 will increase the durability from 100 to 150. The value -50 will reduce the durability from 100 to 50.

hammer.description: The value 50 will increase the durability from 100 to 150. The value -50 will reduce the durability from 100 to 50.

cultivator.description: The value 50 will increase the durability from 100 to 150. The value -50 will reduce the durability from 100 to 50.

hoe.description: The value 50 will increase the durability from 100 to 150. The value -50 will reduce the durability from 100 to 50.

weapons.description: The value 50 will increase the durability from 100 to 150. The value -50 will reduce the durability from 100 to 50.

armor.description: The value 50 will increase the durability from 100 to 150. The value -50 will reduce the durability from 100 to 50.

bows.description: The value 50 will increase the durability from 100 to 150. The value -50 will reduce the durability from 100 to 50.

shields.description: The value 50 will increase the durability from 100 to 150. The value -50 will reduce the durability from 100 to 50.

torch.description: The value 50 will increase the durability from 100 to 150. The value -50 will reduce the durability from 100 to 50.

Armor.description_website: Change the in-game armor values of certain item types.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

helmets.description: The value 50 will increase the armor from 14 to 21. The value -50 will reduce the durability from 14 to 7.

chests.description: The value 50 will increase the armor from 14 to 21. The value -50 will reduce the durability from 14 to 7.

legs.description: The value 50 will increase the armor from 14 to 21. The value -50 will reduce the durability from 14 to 7.

capes.description: The value 50 will increase the armor from 14 to 21. The value -50 will reduce the durability from 14 to 7.

Kiln.description_website: Change the in-game beheavior of the kiln and modify its values.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

maximumWood.description: Maximum amount of wood in a Kiln

productionSpeed.description: The time it takes for the Kiln to produce a single piece of coal in seconds.

autoDeposit.description: Instead of dropping the items, they will be placed inside nearby chests instead.

autoFuel.description: Look for fuel inside nearby chests

ignorePrivateAreaCheck.description: Change true to false to enable private area check when looking for chests.

autoRange.description: The range of the chest detection for the auto deposit and fuel features. (Maximum is 50)

Map.description_website: Change the in-game beheavior of the map and allow for shared map progression between players.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

shareMapProgression.description: With this enabled you will receive the same exploration progression as other players on the server, this will also enable the option for the server to sync everyones exploration progression on connecting to the server.

exploreRadius.description: The radius of the map that you explore when moving

preventPlayerFromTurningOffPublicPositio.description: Prevents you and other people on the server to turn off their map sharing option

Player.description_website: Change or modify most of the in-game character related values.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

baseMaximumWeight.description: The base amount of carry weight of your character

baseMegingjordBuff.description: Increase the buff you receive to your carry weight from Megingjord's girdle

baseAutoPickUpRange.description: Increase auto pickup range of all items

disableCameraShake.description: Disable all types of camera shake

disableCameraSbaseUnarmedDamagehake.description: Disable all types of camera shake

baseUnarmedDamage.description: The base unarmed damage multiplied by your skill level. 120 will result in a maximum of up to 12 damage when you have a skill level of 10.

cropNotifier.description: When changed to true, you will not be permitted to place a crop within the grow radius of another crop

restSecondsPerComfortLevel.description: How many seconds each comfort level contributes to the rested bonus.

deathPenaltyMultiplier.description: Change the death penalty in percentage, where higher will increase the death penalty and lower will reduce it.

autoRepair.description: If set to true, this option will automatically repair your equipment when you interact with the appropriate workbench.

autoEquipShield.description: If set to true, when equipping a one-handed weapon, the best shield from your inventory is automatically equipped. (Best is determined by highest block power)

Server.description_website: Change the behavior of hosted servers and modify previously restricted or hardcoded values.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

maxPlayers.description: Modify the amount of players on your Server

disableServerPassword.description: Removes the requirement to have a server password

enforceMod.description: This settings add a version control check to make sure that people that try to join your game or the server you try to join has V+ installed

serverSyncsConfig.description: Changes whether the server will force it's config on clients that connect. Only affects servers.

serverSyncHotkeys.description: If false allows you to keep your own defined hotkeys instead of synchronising the ones declared for the server. Sections need to be enabled in your local configuration to load hotkeys. This is a client side setting and not affected by server settings.

Stamina.description_website: Change the stamina usage of in-game character related actions.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

dodgeStaminaUsage.description: Changes the amount of stamina cost of using by %

encumberedStaminaDrain.description: Changes the amount of stamina cost of using by %

jumpStaminaDrain.description: Changes the amount of stamina cost of using by %

runStaminaDrain.description: Changes the amount of stamina cost of using by %

sneakStaminaDrain.description: Changes the amount of stamina cost of using by %

staminaRegen.description: Changes the total amount of stamina recovered per second by %

staminaRegenDelay.description: Changes the delay until stamina regeneration sets in by %

swimStaminaDrain.description: Changes the amount of stamina cost of using by %

StaminaUsage.description_website: Change the stamina usage of in-game tools and weapons related actions.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

axes.description: Changes the amount of stamina drain by %

blocking.description: Changes the amount of stamina drain by %

bows.description: Changes the amount of stamina drain by %

clubs.description: Changes the amount of stamina drain by %

knives.description: Changes the amount of stamina drain by %

pickaxes.description: Changes the amount of stamina drain by %

polearms.description: Changes the amount of stamina drain by %

spears.description: Changes the amount of stamina drain by %

swords.description: Changes the amount of stamina drain by %

unarmed.description: Changes the amount of stamina drain by %

hammer.description: Changes the amount of stamina drain by %

hoe.description: Changes the amount of stamina drain by %

cultivator.description: Changes the amount of stamina drain by %

StructuralIntegrity.description_website: Change the behavior of the structural integrity system and their values.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

disableStructuralIntegrity.description: Disables the entire structural integrity system and allows for placement in free air, does not prevent building damage.

disableDamageToPlayerStructures.description: Disables any damage from anything to all player built structures. Does not prevent damage from structural integrity.

disableDamageToPlayerBoats.description: Disables any damage from anything to all player built boats

wood.description: Each of these values reduce the loss of structural integrity by distance by %.

stone.description: Each of these values reduce the loss of structural integrity by distance by %.

iron.description: Each of these values reduce the loss of structural integrity by distance by %.

hardwood.description: Each of these values reduce the loss of structural integrity by distance by %.

Time.description: THIS FEATURE IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT AND IS RIGHT NOW DISABLED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

totalDayTimeInSeconds.description: Total amount of time one complete day and night circle takes to complete

nightTimeSpeedMultiplier.description: Increase the speed at which time passes at night by %. The value 50 would result in a 50% reduced amount of night time. The value 0 would result in a 0% reduced amount (normal amount).

Ward.description_website: Change the values and behavior of the placeable Ward object.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

wardRange.description: The range of wards by meters

Workbench.description_website: Change the values and behavior of the in-game workbenches.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

workbenchRange.description: Set the workbench radius in meters

workbenchAttachmentRange.description: Sets the workbench attachment (e.g. anvil) radius

disableRoofCheck.description: Disables the roof and exposure requirement to use a workbench

Wagon.description_website: Change the values and behavior of the in-game wagon used to transport items.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

wagonBaseMass.description: Change the base wagon physical mass of the wagon object

wagonExtraMassFromItems.description: This value changes the game physical weight of wagons by +/- more/less from item weight inside. The value 50 would increase the weight by 50% more. The value -100 would remove the entire extra weight.

Inventory.description_website: Change the values, size and behavior of the in-game inventory.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

playerInventoryRows.description: Player inventory number of rows (inventory is resized up to 6 rows, higher values will add a scrollbar)

woodChestRows.description: Wood chest number of rows (more than 4 rows will add a scrollbar)

ironChestColumns.description: Iron chests already have 8 columns by default but now you can lower it

ironChestRows.description: Iron chest number of rows (more than 4 rows will add a scrollbar)

cartInventoryRows.description: Cart (Wagon) inventory number of rows (more than 4 rows will add a scrollbar)

karveInventoryRows.description: Karve (small boat) inventory number of rows (more than 4 rows will add a scrollbar)

karveInventoryColumns.description: Karve (small boat) inventory number of columns

longboatInventoryColumns.description: Longboat (large boat) inventory number of columns

longboatInventoryRows.description: Longboat (large boat) inventory number of rows (more than 4 rows will add a scrollbar)

inventoryFillTopToBottom.description: By default tools and weapons go into inventories top to bottom and other materials bottom to top. Set to true to make all items go into the inventory top to bottom.

FreePlacementRotation.description_website: A addition to the basic standard building/placement mode allowing you to rotate all objects on all axis.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section, if you set this to false the mode will not be accesible

rotateY.description: Rotates placement marker by 1 degree with keep ability to attach to nearly pieces

rotateX.description: Rotates placement marker by 1 degree with keep ability to attach to nearly pieces

rotateZ.description: Rotates placement marker by 1 degree with keep ability to attach to nearly pieces

copyRotationParallel.description: Copy rotation of placement marker from target piece in front of you

copyRotationPerpendicular.description: Set rotation to be perpendicular to piece in front of you

Shields.description_website: Change the block values of the in-game shields.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

blockRating.description: Increase or decrease the block value on all shields in %. -50 would be 50% less block rating, 50 would be 50% more block rating.

FirstPerson.description_website: Allows to switch to a first person mode in valheim with very little clipping.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

defaultFOV.description: Default Field Of View to use

raiseFOVHotkey.description: Hotkey to raise Field Of View

lowerFOVHotkey.description: Hotkey to lower Field Of View

GridAlignment.description: When pressing the configured key new buildings will be aligned to a global grid.
GridAlignment.description_website: When pressing the configured key new buildings will be aligned to a global grid, allwoing for consistent placement locations.

enabled.description: Change false to true to enable this section

changeDefaultAlignment.description: Key to change the default alignment direction.
